title: Towards Ethical AI: Empirically Investigating Dimensions of AI Ethics, Trust Repair, and Performance in Human-AI Teaming
author: @b[{Beau G Schelble@c},{ Jeremy Lopez@c},{ Claire Textor@c},{ Rui Zhang@c},{ Nathan J McNeese@c},{ Richard Pak@c},{  ...@c}]@b
abstract: OBJECTIVE: Determining the efficacy of two trust repair strategies (apology and denial) for trust violations of an ethical nature by an autonomous teammate.BACKGROUND: While ethics in human-AI interaction is extensively studied, little research has investigated how decisions with ethical implications impact trust and performance within human-AI teams and their subsequent repair.
